SummaryEnglish: Love has never really been a concern for Mitsuyoshi Tada, and as the aspiring photographer enters his second year of high school. However, things just might change after he meets a foreigner named Teresa Wagner. Nevertheless, after she asks him to photograph her, the two soon separate... only to meet each other again twice more that day! Finding Teresa just as she is caught in a sudden downpour, Tada invites her to his family's coffee shop to dry off. There, she explains that she was separated from her traveling companion, Alec. When Teresa reunites with Alec shortly after, they say their goodbyes - but the two unexpectedly show up as transfer students in his class the next day. Teresa and Alec quickly get used to their lives at the High School and decide to join Tada in the photography club. With these two additions to his equally eccentric group of friends, Tada's second year of high school is about to get even livelier, and he might need to start rethinking his approach to love.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuyoshi encounters a foreign girl who lost her companion while taking photographs. Through many odd series of events they leave and are continuously reunited together.

2.SummaryEnglish: After touring all the clubs at school, Teresa decides to join the photography club. The intensity begins as the club initiates a photography battle!

3.SummaryEnglish: As Nyanko Big is reluctant to help open the shop, Teresa and Alec offer a hand in effort to gain additional experience!

4.TitleEnglish: I'll Pretend I Didn't See This...
4.SummaryEnglish: After Hajime becomes the lucky winner of the HINA's Book Launch Meet and Greet, the photography club helps him overcome his fear.

5.SummaryEnglish: Ijuin-kun treats everyone to his cooking for the Tenth Annual Kaoru Ijuin show. Later Teresa enjoys her first bathhouse experience.

6.SummaryEnglish: An unexpected visitor from Teresa's childhood appears in Japan. He is introduced to the photography club, and later invites Teresa to a party.

7.SummaryEnglish: When Nyanko-big doesn't return home, the gang splits up and does everything they can to make sure he returns home safely.

8.TitleEnglish: Did You Say You Were a Rain-bringer?
8.SummaryEnglish: The photography club goes on an adventure as they take the rental SLR cameras to capture photos of the stars for the September contest.

9.SummaryEnglish: Teresa is acting strange in front of everyone as she secretly makes a very serious decision before returning back to Larsenburg.

10.SummaryEnglish: Teresa fulfills her lifelong dream of watching Rainbow Showgun live with Tada by her side.

11.SummaryEnglish: Questions arise as Teresa and Alec go unexpectedly missing. Mitsuyoshi reminisces about all the times he has spent with her.

12.SummaryEnglish: Tada faces his fears and gets on a plane to Larsenburg in hopes of seeing Teresa again. However, he finds himself in the middle of an awkward situation.

13.SummaryEnglish: Emotions run wild as Teresa and Charles get closer to tying the knot. Tada races to recover his invitation to the ceremony. Will Tada ever be able to settle his feelings?
